episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_0100:
That’s odd—he was just here earlier. I wonder
where he went.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_0200:
Well, he never was the type to stay in one place
for very long.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_0300:
If you both saw him, then he was definitely here
for sure!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_0400:
Yeah, but Team Break got away while I was
distracted. I still have so much to learn.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_0500:
Hey, I get it. This is N we’re talking about,
after all.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_0600:
You know, I’ve been wondering about this for a
while now...
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_0700:
but who exactly is this N guy, anyway? I mean,
what’s his deal?
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_0800:
Wait, you don’t know, Hilda? Even after everything
that happened in Unova?
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_0900: I-I just like to focus on battling—that’s all!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_1000:
Besides, [Name:PlayerNickname ] also needs to
know what’s going on, right?
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_0401_1200: Yes, that’s probably for the best.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_0402_1400:
Yeah, we should bring you up to speed before
we go meet him.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_1600: He used to be the king of Team Plasma.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_1700: Whoa! Team Plasma?! Even I know about them!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_1800:
They’re that group who’d say stuff about how
we need to liberate Pokémon from their
human oppressors.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_1900:
But in reality, they were just a bunch of
Pokémon-stealing jerks!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_2000:
Yeah, we had a few run-ins with Team Plasma
in the past.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_2100: We also clashed with N a few times.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_2200:
But the real mastermind was Ghetsis. He was
controlling everything for his own gain.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_2300:
After Ghetsis was apprehended, Team Plasma
laid low for a while.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_2400:
But N’s feelings toward Pokémon—his beliefs...
they were genuine.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_2600:
He believed that Pokémon suffered because of
misguided humans...
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_2700:
So to change this messed-up world, he thought
we needed to separate Pokémon and humans.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_2800: All to help Pokémon, our friends...
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_2900:
Ghetsis exploited N’s beliefs, and we ended up
battling each other. Looking back, I can’t believe
it even came to that.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_3000:
Even though we all cared about our Pokémon...
we still had to fight.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_3200: N must have a really pure heart, huh?
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_3300:
But through our battles and travels, N’s beliefs
began to waver.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_3400:
He saw with his own eyes how Pokémon and
humans can understand and help each other.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_3500:
And he made a real effort to try to understand
how we felt.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_3600: That’s why N is a really important friend to me!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_3800:
I see! I’m still trying to process all this, but I think
I get how you feel.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_3900: Let’s go find your friend so you can see him again!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_4100:
That said, N is really unpredictable. It might take
a while to figure out where he is.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_4200:
No matter how hard it is, we’ll definitely find N.
There’s a lot of stuff I need to say to him!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4001_1001_4500: OK, let’s head out and find N!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4002_1001_0200:
An artificial island where humans and Pokémon
can coexist...
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4002_1001_0300: I knew it was you! Hey there, N!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4003_1001_0300:
Jeez! Don’t be such a Slowpoke! The sun’s about
to set, and we haven't even finished showing you
around town!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4003_1001_0400:
*chuckle* There’s no rush, Iris. He did just get
here, after all!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4003_1001_0500:
Let us know if anything catches your eye, N.
We’d be happy to give you a closer look.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4003_1001_0700:
By the way, where’s Zekrom? Is it in a Poké Ball
right now?
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4003_1001_0900: It seems Zekrom is also very interested in Pasio.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4003_1001_1000: Whoa! So that’s Zekrom, huh? It’s so cool!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4003_1001_1200: OK, I know where we should go next!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4004_1001_0200:
It’s normally used for Pokémon battles, but there
aren’t any matches happening today.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4004_1001_0400: Iris, I’ll go get us permission to use the arena!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4004_1001_0500: Oh... Do you not like Pokémon battles, N?
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4004_1001_0800:
A Pokémon battle is a way for us to see what
wonderful things others have to contribute.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4004_1001_0900:
Accepting different ideas and different beings
changes the world like a chemical reaction.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4004_1001_1200:
I don’t really get all that, but I guess it means you
don’t hate Pokémon battles! Me, I love to battle!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4004_1001_1700: You know what I did in Unova, don’t you?
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4004_1001_1800:
I was the king of Team Plasma. We fought the
Gym Leaders and the Champion. We opposed
everything you stood for.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4004_1001_1900:
You have every reason to hate me. I don’t see
why you would be kind to me.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4004_1001_2000: So...why? Why are you being so welcoming?
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4004_1001_2300:
You know, the former Champion of Unova, Alder,
was really, really strong.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4004_1001_2400: But he lost to you, right?
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4004_1001_2700:
the ones who change the world are always the
ones who pursued their dreams.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4004_1001_2800: I think that’s why you beat him!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4004_1001_2900:
Because you’ve been pursuing your dream of
making Pokémon happy!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4004_1001_3100:
There’s no way I could hate someone like that!
And also...
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4004_1001_3200: Zekrom is so calm around you.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4004_1001_3300:
I know you can understand what Pokémon say, but
I can tell what dragons are feeling!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4004_1001_3700:
It’s not just that you can understand the hearts
of dragons.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4004_1001_3800: You also understand the hearts of people.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4004_1001_3900:
With you as Champion, Unova will become a place
where Pokémon can live peacefully.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4004_1001_4300: I got permission to use the arena!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4004_1001_4700:
I’ve always wanted to battle you! You defeated
Alder, after all!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4004_1001_5000:
I want to see the power of the current
Unova Champion!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4005_1001_0100: Phew... Boy, are you two strong!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4005_1001_0300:
I wonder what would have happened if you had
been the Champion I challenged back then.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4005_1001_0400: It’s getting late. Let’s head out, shall we?
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4005_1001_0500:
Let’s hang out again tomorrow! I’ll bring Hilbert
along, too!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4005_1001_0700:
Come to think of it, he’s been wanting to see you
again for a while now! We probably should have
invited him today.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4005_1001_0800: Then I’ll definitely bring him with me tomorrow!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4005_1001_0900: I’m going to see him again...
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4006_1001_0100:
The sun’s starting to set... Guess we couldn’t find
any clues to N’s whereabouts.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4006_0401_0300: Yeah! It’s still too early to give up!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4006_0401_0400:
I understand how you both feel, but it’s getting
dark. Let’s stop for today.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4006_0402_0600:
Good idea. It’ll be harder to find him when it’s
dark out, anyway.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4006_1001_0800: Hey, cheer up! We know he’s here somewhere!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4006_1001_0900:
Let’s ask Bianca to help us tomorrow. I’m sure
we’ll find him if we do.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4006_1001_1400: Give us your Pokémon! It’s for its own good!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4006_1001_1700: My Zoroark is strong! I’ve spent years raising it!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4006_1001_1900:
If you’re going to resort to force, you’ll have to
go through us.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4006_1001_2200: Well? You gonna take us on or what?
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4006_1001_2300: Very well... We won’t take this Pokémon.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4006_1001_2400:
However! You’re coming with us to our
secret hideout!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4006_1001_2500:
What in the world are you talking about? There’s
no way we’re going with you.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4006_1001_2600: Heh heh heh... Maybe this’ll change your mind.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4006_1001_2700: Waaah! Waaah! I want my big brother!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4006_1001_3200: Heh heh... How very cooperative of you!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4007_1001_0100: This is a world created by humans...
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4007_1001_0500:
It’s really weird—for some reason, we can’t get
ahold of him!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4007_1001_0600: And not just him! Cheren and Hilda, too!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4007_1001_0700:
It’s not like them at all. I hope nothing bad
has happened...
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4007_1001_0900:
I’m with PML staff. Do you have a moment to
answer a few questions?
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4007_1001_1000: That’s them! It’s Hilbert and our friends!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4007_1001_1100: They were kidnapped by Team Break?!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4007_1001_1200: They did it to save us...
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4007_1001_1500: Hilbert and the others will be OK.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4007_1001_1600:
I wanna go help them...but we don’t know where
they went...
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4008_1001_0100:
It’s been a while since they brought us here, but
we still have no idea what Team Break is up to.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4008_1001_0200:
Yeah. I can’t believe they’re just keeping us
locked up here.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4008_0301_0300: What in the world are they thinking?
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4008_0401_0400: No idea. That’s why it’s so creepy.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4008_0302_0500: What if they never let us go?
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4008_0402_0600:
No way! We’ll find a way out of here—don’t
you worry!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4008_1001_0700:
Focus on staying calm. That way, we can be
prepared to deal with whatever they try to do.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4008_1001_0800: Argh! I can’t take it anymore!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4008_1001_0900: Hey! Team Break! Come out and face us!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4008_1001_1100: Well, aren’t you a feisty one?
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4008_1001_1200:
Sorry, but we’re in the middle of preparing a
grand welcome for N.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4008_1001_1300: N?! What’s he got to do with this?
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4008_1001_1400:
If you’re here, N will surely come. You’re the
reason Team Plasma fell from grace...
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4008_1001_1500: I’m just using you so I can achieve my dream!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4008_1001_1600: What’s going on?! Why is the ground shaking?!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4009_1001_0300: How did they find our secret hideout?!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4009_1001_0400:
This little one remembered your scent and led us
right to you.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4009_1001_0500: I’m here to rescue my friends!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4009_1001_1000: Hold tight! We’ll get you out of this!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4009_1001_1200: I’ve dreamed of meeting you, N.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_0100: I’m glad we’re getting out of this mess, but...
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_0200: N, do you know this guy?
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_0300: No. At least...I don’t think so...
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_0400:
Of course you wouldn’t know me. I’m not
from Unova.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_0500: But I believe wholeheartedly in your dream!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_0700:
Have you had a chance to walk the streets of
Pasio, Your Majesty?
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_1000:
“A paradise where humans and Pokémon coexist.”
That’s supposedly the concept of this island.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_1100: But nothing could be further from the truth!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_1200:
This place is nothing but a glorified prison
for Pokémon...
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_1400:
That’s nonsense! You don’t know what you’re
talking about!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_1500: Nonsense, you say? Think about it!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_1600:
Pokémon are trapped on this island and have their
freedom taken away! It’s no different from the
oppression of a Poké Ball!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_1700:
And they’re forced to battle each other in that
ridiculous PML tournament!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_1800:
Even Pokémon who don’t want to battle are forced
to do so against their will!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_1900:
This island is nothing but a false utopia, created
by egotistical humans!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_2200:
And where do you get off lecturing us after all
the bad things Team Break has done?
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_2300:
Yes, I agree. Team Break is the worst. They
selfishly use Pokémon for their own desires.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_2500: And I wanted to use that power to save Pokémon!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_2700: Your Majesty! Please, help me save the Pokémon!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_2800: Become the king of Team Break!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_3100:
We’re nothing like Ghetsis! We really want to
save Pokémon!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_3200:
We want to change this gray world, where black
and white—people and Pokémon—have been
mixed together instead of kept separate...
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_3300: So please! Lend us your strength!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_3600: I have traveled the world and seen much of it...
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_3700:
No matter where I went, the relationship between
people and Pokémon was the same.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_4000: Exactly! That’s what we need to change!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_4200: That’s how you see the world. It’s not what I see.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_4400:
This world isn’t gray at all. You only see it that
way because you’re not trying to see the truth!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_4500:
I’ve seen with my own eyes people and
Pokémon coexisting.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_4600: I saw it here on this paradise island called Pasio!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_4800:
Pokémon can unleash their true power by being
with people.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_4900:
And people can discover their true potential by
being with Pokémon.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_5000:
Instead of separating black and white, we must
accept it.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_5100:
That’s what I learned from my travels around
the world!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_5200: The formula that makes up this world!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_5400: Your Majesty, no... It can’t be...
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_5500:
Even if Team Plasma has changed, I didn’t want to
believe that you’ve changed, too.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_5700: I will be the successor of your old dream!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_5800: Right after I take you down!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_5900:
After all that talk, you’re just going to resort to
brute force?
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_6000:
We’ll handle these ones back here! N, Hilbert—you
guys take him down!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4010_1001_6300: We’ll protect the dreams of everyone here!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4011_1001_0300: Argh! Why are you so strong?
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4011_1001_0500:
I don’t want to, but...fine. There’s no way I can
win here.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4011_1001_0700: I’ll be back to make your old dream a reality!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4011_1001_1000:
This is why we shouldn’t separate people
and Pokémon.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4011_1001_1200:
Your friend loves you. It says it wants to be with
you forever.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4011_1001_1300: That’s why it battled us with everything it had.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4011_1001_1400:
If you make your dream a reality, you’ll be
separated forever.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4011_1001_1500:
And yet, your friend still fought its hardest
for you...
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4011_1001_1700:
Instead of listening to the things I said in the past,
maybe you should listen more to your friend here.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4011_1001_1800: Your Pokémon has so much love for you.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4012_1001_0100:
I was really worried when I heard you’d been
kidnapped, but I’m so glad you’re all OK!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4012_1001_0200:
Yeah! And we finally were able to get Hilbert and
N together.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4012_0301_0500: Did you wanna talk to N, too?
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4012_0401_0600: Yeah. I have my own history with him.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4012_0401_0700:
Now that I’m a Gym Leader, I think I’d be able to
approach our conversation from a different point
of view.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4012_0402_0900:
Yeah. I’m just wondering what was so important
that he had to tell N in person.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4012_0402_1000: I’d like to talk to N, too...
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4012_1001_1100:
but there’s a proper order to this sort of thing,
you know?
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4012_1001_1200: So I’ll let Hilbert go first.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4012_1001_1300: Bianca told me you’ve been looking for me.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4012_1001_1500: I thought about you a lot during my travels.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4012_1001_1800:
I wouldn’t be the person I am today if it weren’t
for you.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4012_1001_2100: That’s what friends are for, you know?
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4012_1001_2400:
Speaking of which, there’s something I’ve been
wanting to talk to you about!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4012_1001_2600: Before you left to go on your journey...
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4012_1001_2700:
you told me I should make my dream come true—
and that you believed I could do it...
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4012_1001_2800:
Then you just up and left after saying good-bye!
I mean, what gives?!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4012_1001_2900: Give me a chance to respond, at least!
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4012_1001_3200:
You’ve been looking for me all this time just to
tell me that?
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4012_1001_3300: D-don’t laugh! Maybe it’s a little childish, but...
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4012_1001_3400:
No, I’m sorry. That really was selfish of me,
wasn’t it.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4012_1001_3500:
Let me make it up to you. I plan on staying on
Pasio for a while, anyway.
episode_event_ch0089_00_n/4012_1001_3600:
Instead of good-bye this time, maybe I
should say...
